Summary Note:
The RM first met Kaufmann Furrer Burkart at a luxury car show in Zürich. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 45 years, Kaufmann Furrer Burkart has established himself as a key player in the industry.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Kaufmann Furrer Burkart has been happily married to Evelyne since 1980. Kaufmann and Evelyne have 2 children, named Lehmann and Huber.
Education Background:
Kaufmann completed his secondary education at Gymnasium Köniz Bern in 1973.
Kaufmann graduated from University of Neuchâtel in 1979, completing his higher education.
Occupation History:
Kaufmann Furrer Burkart is a 69 year old and comes from Switzerland.
Kaufmann Furrer Burkart launched his career as a Software Developer at Google Switzerland GmbH, where he gained valuable experience from 1980 to 1983.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Startup Founder at IBM Switzerland Ltd. in 1983, further expanding his skill set.
From 1989 till retirement, he served as a CEO at Google Switzerland GmbH, solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 1530000 CHF.
He has house located in Thun, worth 2930000 CHF.

He purchased flat in Neuchatel, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1900000 CHF.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Kaufmann as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
